features: Exclusive Vortex Technology - Evenly saturates grounds for full flavor extraction
Sneak-A-Cup Feature - Grab a cup of coffee before brewing ends
Easy Pour, Non-Drip Carafe - Improved pouring and easy cleaning
Removable Filter Basket - Dishwasher safe makes clean-up a breeze
Nonstick “Keep Hot” Carafe Plate - Keeps coffee hot, resists stains and wipes clean easily
body.description: BLACK+DECKER 12-Cup Coffee Maker with Easy On/Off Switch, Easy Pour, Non-Drip Carafe with Removable Filter Basket, Black. This Coffee Maker is your kitchen friendly coffee maker, with just a flip of a switch you get up to 12 cups of hot coffee ready to go. And with the Sneak-A-Cup™ Feature, you can grab a cup of coffee before brewing ends. Includes a removable filter basket that is dishwasher safe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid Easy To Use
reviews.reviewText: After buying a "gourmet" coffee maker that stopped working the second time I used it and was returned my girlfriend recommended this coffee maker which she has owned for years. It is simple to use with an on/off switch and no other doodads to fail. It brews great coffee and is solidly built. The only issue I have is the lid on the carafe is not removable for cleaning and I worry it might break when washing it as it seems to be the most fragile part of the unit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good workaday coffeemaker
reviews.reviewText: I bought the Black and Decker 12-cup because I was having company over the holidays and needed to be able to serve more than my little 5-cup maker could. The 12-cup has no bells and whistles, just makes a pot of hot coffee pretty quickly and reliably. I’m perfectly fine with it, and it was very reasonably priced.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars it is fine but fantastic for the price
reviews.reviewText: Since the McDonalds debacle in AZ, the days of hot coffee is over for less than $100. lol.It is small, offers less space and works well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Coffee maker Awesome!!
reviews.reviewText: Awesome coffee maker. Simple makes great coffee!And the price. Very good price. If you need a good simple coffee maker that brews great coffee buy this one, I recommend it. I love mine!!👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect, Basic Coffee Maker
reviews.reviewText: Such a perfect, easy to use coffee maker. Couldn't ask for anything better. Lightweight, super easy to clean, inexpensive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Left hand or Right hand fill & delicious
reviews.reviewText: On and Off Switch, the only thing you need for really good coffee from the first pot.There is no "new" smell at all. I ran 5 pots of water through with a filter (cooling in between), I didn't want any "new" taste. First pot was great.Just what I like, but I use the stainless universal scoop, and put 7 heaping Maxwell House Original Medium Roast, and there were no grounds that went over.When you fill to the 12 cup line, if you look inside, the overflow hole in the back is higher so you can add a little more water. More COFFEE!Love my new Coffee Maker, great one Black + DeckerThanks from a left handed person, who can fill it from the left side. The only thing I would change is have the numbers on both sides of the glass pot, because in your left hand you can't see them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this coffeemaker after my larger one decided to stop working. It’s a good size for one person and it’s actually pretty quick at brewing.The downsides are it is small if you need more than 5 cups and it doesn’t have a feature that stops brewing if you take the carafe off.Overall, however, it’s a great coffeemaker for the price and for the needs of one person.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No "sneak a cup" and that's a good thing.
reviews.reviewText: Most coffee pots have the feature that supposedly let's you take a cup while the machine is still brewing, but they always spill some coffee when you do that. At least that's been my experience. And that shut off nozzle hanging down catches the pot when you replace it on the hotplate spilling some more coffee.This pot doesn't have that feature so there is nothing hanging down to for the pot to catch on when replacing it. I think that "sneak a cup" feature is stupid to begin with. I turn the pot on as soon as I go into the kitchen in the morning and by the time I feed the cats the coffee is ready. It's only a 5 cup pot so it doesn't take long to brew. The size is perfect for me as I'm the only one drinking from it.I also like that the coffee stays steaming hot on the plate even after an hour or more. I like my coffee very hot and my old pot didn't keep the coffee hot enough. I always had to microwave it to get it hot enough. Not so with this pot.

reviews.reviewTitle: Simple operation & Makes quick cups of coffee!
reviews.reviewText: If you don't want extra features such as programmable, this is a great coffeemaker. Simple On/Off switch. Takes basket-style filters.
This coffee maker brews great tasting coffee, and makes it quickly. Simple, small, yet better than all the expensive coffee makers out there.

La cafetera es pequeña, pero es justo lo que yo necesito. La relación calidad precio es excelente. Estoy fascinado con mi cafetera.Por accidente, después de mucho tiempo de uso, rompí la jarra de mi cafetera y no la encuentro en línea, ¿alguien me podrá ayudar? Lo de menos sería comprar otra cafetera, pero me gusta mucho ésta y quiero reemplazar la jarra.

reviews.reviewTitle: Very nice coffee maker. Easy to use and easy to clean.
reviews.reviewText: I like this product because I wanted a coffee maker that takes filters. This electric coffee make is perfect for my needs. Very prompt shipping, too! I am very pleased with my purchase. Thank you!

reviews.reviewTitle: Best little coffee pot you’ll ever have
reviews.reviewText: Compact, good value for money. Makes the best 2 cups of coffee. No extra useless buttons. On-Off, all you need.
